name.pt_BR,pt_PT: Zotifique o bloqueador de anúncios Plus

short.ar: منع جميع الإعلانات على مشغل الويب Spotify ™ واستمتع بالموسيقى بدون انقطاع
short.am: በማያያዣ ™ ድር ማጫወቻ ላይ ሁሉንም ማስታወቂያዎች አግድ እና ያለምንም ማቋረጦች ሙዚቃ ይደሰቱ
short.bg: Блокирайте всички реклами на уеб плейър Spotify ™ и се наслаждавайте на музика без прекъсвания
short.bn: স্পটিফাই ™ ওয়েব প্লেয়ার এ সমস্ত বিজ্ঞাপন ব্লক করুন এবং কোনও বাধা ছাড়াই সংগীত উপভোগ করুন
short.ca: Bloquegeu tots els anuncis del reproductor web Spotify ™ i gaudiu de la música sense interrupcions
short.cs: Blokujte všechny reklamy na webovém přehrávači Spotify ™ a užijte si hudbu bez přerušení
short.da: Bloker alle annoncer på Spotify ™ Web Player og nyd musik uden afbrydelser
short.de: Blockieren Sie alle Anzeigen auf dem Spotify ™ Web Player und genießen Sie Musik ohne Unterbrechungen
short.el: Αποκλείστε όλες τις διαφημίσεις στο Web Player του Spotify ™ και απολαύστε μουσική χωρίς διακοπές
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fi: Block All Ads on Spotify™ Web Player And Enjoy Music With No Interruptions
short.es,es_419: Bloquee todos los anuncios en el reproductor web Spotify ™ y disfrute de la música sin interrupciones
short.et: Blokeerige Spotify ™ veebipleieri kõik reklaamid ja nautige muusikat ilma katkestusteta
short.fa: تمام تبلیغات را در Spotify ™ Web Player مسدود کنید و از موسیقی بدون وقفه لذت ببرید
short.fil: I -block ang lahat ng mga ad sa Spotify ™ web player at mag -enjoy ng musika na walang mga pagkagambala
short.fr: Bloquez toutes les annonces sur le lecteur Web Spotify ™ et profitez de la musique sans interruption
short.gu: સ્પોટાઇફ ™ વેબ પ્લેયર પર બધી જાહેરાતો અવરોધિત કરો અને કોઈ વિક્ષેપો વિના સંગીતનો આનંદ માણો
short.he: חסום את כל המודעות בנגן האינטרנט של Spotify ™ ונהנה ממוזיקה ללא הפרעות
short.hi: Spotify ™ वेब प्लेयर पर सभी विज्ञापनों को ब्लॉक करें और बिना किसी रुकावट के संगीत का आनंद लें
short.hr: Blokirajte sve oglase na web playeru Spotify ™ i uživajte u glazbi bez prekida
short.hu: Blokkolja az összes hirdetést a Spotify ™ webes lejátszón, és élvezze a zenét megszakítások nélkül
short.id: Blokir semua iklan di pemutar web Spotify ™ dan nikmati musik tanpa gangguan
short.it: Blocca tutti gli annunci su Web Player Spotify ™ e goditi la musica senza interruzioni
short.ja: Spotify™Webプレーヤーのすべての広告をブロックし、中断なしで音楽を楽しむ
short.kn: ಸ್ಪಾಟಿಫೈ ™ ವೆಬ್ ಪ್ಲೇಯರ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಜಾಹೀರಾತುಗಳನ್ನು ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಯಾವುದೇ ಅಡೆತಡೆಗಳಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಸಂಗೀತವನ್ನು ಆನಂದಿಸಿ
short.ko: Spotify ™ 웹 플레이어의 모든 광고를 차단하고 중단없이 음악을 즐기십시오.
short.lt: Užblokuokite visus „Spotify ™“ žiniatinklio grotuvų skelbimus ir mėgaukitės muzika be jokių pertraukimų
short.lv: Bloķēt visas reklāmas vietnē Spotify ™ tīmekļa atskaņotājā un baudiet mūziku bez pārtraukumiem
short.ml: സ്പോട്ട്ഫൈ ™ വെബ് പ്ലെയറിൽ എല്ലാ പരസ്യങ്ങളും തടയുക കൂടാതെ തടസ്സങ്ങളൊന്നുമില്ലാതെ സംഗീതം ആസ്വദിക്കൂ
short.mr: स्पॉटिफाई ™ वेब प्लेयरवरील सर्व जाहिराती अवरोधित करा आणि व्यत्यय न घेता संगीताचा आनंद घ्या
short.ms: Sekat semua iklan di Spotify ™ Web Player dan Nikmati muzik tanpa gangguan
short.nl: Blokkeer alle advertenties op Spotify ™ -webspeler en geniet van muziek zonder onderbrekingen
short.no: Blokker alle annonser på Spotify ™ nettspiller og nyt musikk uten avbrudd
short.pl: Zablokuj wszystkie reklamy na odtwarzacz Spotify ™ i ciesz się muzyką bez przerwy
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Bloqueie todos os anúncios no spotify ™ web player e aproveite a música sem interrupções
short.ro: Blocați toate anunțurile pe playerul web Spotify ™ și bucurați -vă de muzică fără întreruperi
short.ru: Заблокируйте все объявления на веб -плеере Spotify ™ и наслаждайтесь музыкой без перерывов
short.sk: Blokujte všetky reklamy na webovom prehrávači Spotify ™ a vychutnajte si hudbu bez prerušenia
short.sl: Blokirajte vse oglase na spletnem predvajalniku Spotify ™ in uživajte v glasbi brez prekinitev
short.sr: Блокирајте све огласе на веб плејеру Спотифи ™ и уживајте у музици без прекида
short.sv: Blockera alla annonser på Spotify ™ webbspelare och njut av musik utan avbrott
short.sw: Zuia matangazo yote kwenye kicheza wavuti cha Spotify ™ na ufurahie muziki bila usumbufu
short.ta: Spotify ™ வலை பிளேயரில் உள்ள அனைத்து விளம்பரங்களையும் தடுத்து, எந்த குறுக்கீடுகளும் இல்லாமல் இசையை அனுபவிக்கவும்
short.te: స్పాటిఫై ™ వెబ్ ప్లేయర్‌లో అన్ని ప్రకటనలను బ్లాక్ చేయండి మరియు అంతరాయాలు లేని సంగీతాన్ని ఆస్వాదించండి
short.th: บล็อกโฆษณาทั้งหมดบน Web Player Spotify ™และเพลิดเพลินกับเพลงโดยไม่มีการหยุดชะงัก
short.tr: Spotify ™ Web Player'daki tüm reklamları engelleyin ve kesintisiz müziğin tadını çıkarın
short.uk: Блокуйте всі оголошення на веб -плеєрі Spotify ™ та насолоджуйтесь музикою без перебоїв
short.vi: Chặn tất cả các quảng cáo trên trình phát web Spotify ™ và thưởng thức âm nhạc mà không bị gián đoạn
short.zh_CN: 在Spotify™Web播放器上阻止所有广告，并享受没有中断的音乐
short.zh_TW: 在Spotify™Web播放器上阻止所有廣告，並享受沒有中斷的音樂

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
**Experience Ad-Free Music on Spotify™ Web Player with Our Ad Blocker Extension**

Are you tired of being interrupted by annoying audio ads while enjoying your favorite music on Spotify™ Web Player? Look no further! Our Spotify Ad Blocker Extension is here to provide you with an uninterrupted music streaming experience.

Key Features:

- Block All Ads Automatically: Our extension ensures that all audio ads on Spotify™ Web Player are blocked, allowing you to enjoy your music without any interruptions.

- Desktop Compatibility: Designed for desktop, laptop, and PC users, our extension seamlessly integrates with your browser, offering ad-free listening on Spotify™ Web Player.

- Free Version Support: Enjoy automatic ad blocking even on the Spotify™ Free Version, enhancing your listening experience without the need for a premium subscription.

Disclaimer:

We would like to clarify that our Spotify Ad Blocker Extension is an independent project and is not affiliated with Spotify or Spotify Technology S.A. in any way. Spotify™ is a trademark of Spotify Technology S.A., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

Important Notice:

Please be aware that this extension goes against Spotify's Terms of Service. While it is highly effective at blocking ads, we advise you to use it at your own discretion.

Don't let ads ruin your music streaming experience. Install our Spotify Ad Blocker Extension today and enjoy ad-free listening on Spotify™ Web Player.
long.en,en_AU,fi:
**Experience Ad-Free Music on Spotify™ Web Player with Our Ad Blocker Extension**

Are you tired of being interrupted by annoying audio ads while enjoying your favorite music on Spotify™ Web Player? Look no further! Our Ad Blocker Extension is here to provide you with an uninterrupted music streaming experience.

Key Features:

- Block All Ads Automatically: Our extension ensures that all audio ads on Web Player are blocked, allowing you to enjoy your music without any interruptions.

- Desktop Compatibility: Designed for desktop, laptop, and PC users, our extension seamlessly integrates with your browser, offering ad-free listening.

- Free Version Support: Enjoy automatic ad blocking, enhancing your listening experience without the need for a premium subscription.

Disclaimer:

We would like to clarify that our Extension is an independent project and is not affiliated with Spotify™ or Spotify™ Technology S.A. in any way. It is a trademark of Spotify Technology S.A., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

Important Notice:

Please be aware that this extension goes against Terms of Service. While it is highly effective at blocking ads, we advise you to use it at your own discretion.
